FuncDef:
The connect-slot command associates a slot with a Remote-Ap or VBridge interface.
The undo connect-slot command deletes the slot associated with a Remote-Ap or VBridge interface.
By default, a Remote-Ap or VBridge interface associates with no slot.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the ID of a slot.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 18.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In an ipran virtual cluster access, after you create a Remote-Ap or VBridge interface, run the connect-slot command to associate a slot with the Remote-Ap or VBridge interface. If no slot is specified, services will be affected.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
